Description: Heavy/Light: Gravity fluctuates. Jump distance is tripled OR movement speed is halved. Projectiles drop instantly or fly forever.
Lag/Freeze: Objects stop in mid-air for seconds before falling. Combat rounds have a "cooldown" where no one can move.
Hyper-Reflex: Everything moves faster. +2 to Initiative, but if you roll a 1 on a check, you drop your weapon due to vibration.
Phase-Shift: Solid objects (walls, floor) become permeable 50% of the time. You might sink into the floor or walk through a door.
Overgrowth: Plants grapple anyone standing still. Wounds heal 1HP per round, but grow flowers/moss that must be cut off.
Volatility: Any metal spark or spell causes a small explosion (1d4 fire damage). The air is uncomfortably hot.
Wild Magic: Every spell or special ability triggers a random side effect (color change, voice pitch shift, random teleport).
Geometry: Curves are impossible. You can only move in straight lines (Grid movement enforced). Ranged attacks cannot arc.
Prism: It is blindingly bright. Invisible creatures are revealed. Illusions become solid/real. Stealth is impossible.
Decay: Items degrade. A natural 1 on an attack breaks the weapon. Potions spoil if not used immediately.
Empathy: Damage is shared. If you hit an enemy, you take 1 psychic damage. If you heal an ally, you gain 1 HP.
The Rule: A random law is imposed (e.g., "No Metal," "Silence," "Only Truth"). Breaking it deals automatic psychic damage.
